mint(address,uint256).details: This contract calculates how much collateral should be taken

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(address,uint256).details: This contract calculates how much collateral should be given

params.destination: Where the collateral will be sent
params.shares: The amount of zai to redeem

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

toCollateralAmountWithFee(uint256,uint25.details: Fee is calculated as (amount * (MAX_FEE_BPS + fee)) / MAX_FEE_BPS

params._fee: The fee to be charged in BPS

toCollateralAmountWithFeeInverse(uint256.details: Fee is calculated as (amount * (MAX_FEE_BPS - fee)) / MAX_FEE_BPS

params._fee: The fee to be charged in BPS

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._debtCap: How much debt can be held
params._supplyCap: How much collateral can be taken

params._mintFeeBps: The new mint fee in BPS
params._redeemFeeBps: The new redeem fee in BPS

Mint(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a user mints ZAI

RateUpdated(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when the rate is updated

SupplyCapUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Emitted when the supply cap is updated

MAX_FEE_BPS().notice: The maximum fee that can be charged

debt().notice: Returns the current debt held in this vault

feeDestination().notice: The address where fees are sent

feesCollected().notice: How much fees has been collected by the protocol

mintAmountIn(uint256).notice: Calculates how much ZAI should be minted for a given amount of collateral

rate().notice: Returns the current rate of ZAI/Collateral

redeemAmountOut(uint256).notice: Calculates how much ZAI should be redeemed for a given amount of collateral

toCollateralAmountWithFee(uint256,uint25.notice: Converts ZAI amount to collateral with fee added

toCollateralAmountWithFeeInverse(uint256.notice: Converts ZAI amount to collateral with fee removed

updateCaps(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the supply and debt caps

updateFees(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the mint and redeem fees

userdoc.notice: Used to mint ZAI with collateral at a pre-defined rate
